entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning and 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10 except minus 15 in low lying areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 10 except minus 15 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 04 January 2023
